member.name: DAV_CALLBACK_CRED
member.summary: Stores user credential information that was retrieved by the DavAuthCallback callback function.

member.name: DAV_CALLBACK_CRED.AuthBlob
member.summary: If the bAuthBlobValid member is TRUE, this member is a structure that contains the user credential information.

member.name: DAV_CALLBACK_CRED.UNPBlob
member.summary: If the bAuthBlobValid member is FALSE, this member is a structure that contains the user credential information.

member.name: DAV_CALLBACK_CRED.bAuthBlobValid
member.summary: TRUE if the credential information is stored in the AuthBlob member, and the UNPBlob member should be ignored. FALSE if it is stored in the UNPBlob member, and the AuthBlob member should be ignored.

member.name: DAV_CALLBACK_CRED.bSave
member.summary: TRUE if the credential information was written to the credential manager, or FALSE otherwise.
